pli-tv-pvr1.1:2.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattaṃ, kaṃ ārabbha, kismiṃ vatthusmiṃ?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:2.13: Ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:2.14: Kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:2.18: Kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.6: Sudinno kalandaputto purāṇadutiyikāya methunaṃ dhammaṃ paṭisevi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.26: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.32: Ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.34: Kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.41: “Na evarūpaṃ karissāmī”ti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.42: Kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.43: Dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamaṃ pārājikaṃ paññattaṃ—
pli-tv-pvr1.1:3.44: saṃghasuṭṭhutāya, saṃghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:20.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dutiyaṃ pārājikaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:20.6: Dhaniyo kumbhakāraputto rañño dārūni adinnaṃ ādiyi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:20.10: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:20.11: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:20.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:21.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū aññamaññaṃ jīvitā voropesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:21.10: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:21.11: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:21.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:22.6: Vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:22.10: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:22.11: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:22.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:26.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññatto?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:26.15: Ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:26.16: Kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhaṃ?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:26.17: Kā vipatti, kā sampatti, kā paṭipatti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:26.18: Kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṃghādiseso paññatto?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.6: Āyasmā seyyasako hatthena upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.26: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.32: Ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.34: Kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.41: Na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.42: Kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṃghādiseso paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.43: Dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā upakkamitvā asuciṃ mocentassa saṃghādiseso paññatto—
pli-tv-pvr1.1:27.44: saṃghasuṭṭhutāya, saṃghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:44.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajjantassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:44.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ kāyasaṃsaggaṃ samāpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:44.9: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:45.1: Mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsantassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:45.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmaṃ duṭṭhullāhi vācāhi obhāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:45.9: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:45.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:45.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:46.1: Mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ bhāsantassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:46.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa santike attakāmapāricariyāya vaṇṇaṃ abhāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:46.9: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:46.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:46.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:47.6: Āyasmā udāyī sañcarittaṃ samāpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:47.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:47.10: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:47.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:47.12: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:47.13: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:47.14: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:48.1: Saññācikāya kuṭiṃ kārāpentassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:48.6: Āḷavakā bhikkhū saññācikāya kuṭiyo kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:49.1: Mahallakaṃ vihāraṃ kārāpentassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:49.6: Āyasmā channo vihāravatthuṃ sodhento aññataraṃ cetiyarukkhaṃ chedāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:50.1: Bhikkhuṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:50.6: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ amūlakena pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:51.1: Bhikkhuṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsentassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:51.6: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ aññabhāgiyassa adhikaraṇassa kiñci desaṃ lesamattaṃ upādāya pārājikena dhammena anuddhaṃsesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:52.1: Saṃghabhedakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:52.6: Devadatto samaggassa saṃghassa bhedāya parakkami, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:52.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:53.1: Bhedānuvattakānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantānaṃ saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:53.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū devadattassa saṃghabhedāya parakkamantassa anuvattakā ahesuṃ vaggavādakā, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:53.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:54.1: Dubbacassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:54.6: Āyasmā channo bhikkhūhi sahadhammikaṃ vuccamāno attānaṃ avacanīyaṃ akāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:54.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:55.1: Kuladūsakassa bhikkhuno yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa saṃghādiseso kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:55.6: Assajipunabbasukā bhikkhū saṃghena pabbājanīyakammakatā bhikkhū chandagāmitā dosagāmitā mohagāmitā bhayagāmitā pāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:55.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:60.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo aniyato kattha paññatto?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:60.4: Atthi tattha paññatti, anupaññatti, anuppannapaññatti, sabbatthapaññatti padesapaññatti, sādhāraṇapaññatti asādhāraṇapaññatti, ekatopaññatti ubhatopaññatti, pañcannaṃ pātimokkhuddesānaṃ katthogadhaṃ kattha pariyāpannaṃ, katamena uddesena uddesaṃ āgacchati, catunnaṃ vipattīnaṃ katamā vipatti, sattannaṃ āpattikkhandhānaṃ katamo āpattikkhandho, channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ katihi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti, catunnaṃ adhikaraṇānaṃ katamaṃ adhikaraṇaṃ, sattannaṃ samathānaṃ katihi samathehi sammati, ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayo, kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhaṃ, kā vipatti, kā sampatti, kā paṭipatti, kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamo aniyato paññatto, ke sikkhanti, ke sikkhitasikkhā, kattha ṭhitaṃ, ke dhārenti, kassa vacanaṃ kenābhatanti.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena paṭhamo aniyato kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho paṭicchanne āsane alaṃkammaniye nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.23: Siyā pārājikāpattikkhandho siyā saṃghādisesāpattikkhandho siyā pācittiyāpattikkhandho.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.26: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.31: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.32: Ko tattha vinayo, ko tattha abhivinayoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.34: Kiṃ tattha pātimokkhaṃ, kiṃ tattha adhipātimokkhanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.41: Na evarūpaṃ karissāmīti yāvajīvaṃ āpāṇakoṭikaṃ samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.42: Kati atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamo aniyato paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.43: Dasa atthavase paṭicca bhagavatā paṭhamo aniyato paññatto—
pli-tv-pvr1.1:61.44: saṃghasuṭṭhutāya, saṃghaphāsutāya, dummaṅkūnaṃ puggalānaṃ niggahāya, pesalānaṃ bhikkhūnaṃ phāsuvihārāya, diṭṭhadhammikānaṃ āsavānaṃ saṃvarāya, samparāyikānaṃ āsavānaṃ paṭighātāya, appasannānaṃ pasādāya, pasannānaṃ bhiyyobhāvāya, saddhammaṭṭhitiyā, vinayānuggahāya.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:78.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena dutiyo aniyato kattha paññattoti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:78.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmena saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:78.26: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:78.27: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:78.28: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:78.33: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:82.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena atirekacīvaraṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:82.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekacīvaraṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:82.9: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:82.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:83.1: Ekarattaṃ ticīvarena vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:83.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ hatthe cīvaraṃ nikkhipitvā santaruttarena janapadacārikaṃ pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:83.9: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:83.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:84.1: Akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:84.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū akālacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā māsaṃ atikkāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:84.9: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:84.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:85.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:85.6: Āyasmā udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā purāṇacīvaraṃ dhovāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:86.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:86.6: Āyasmā udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā hatthato cīvaraṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:87.1: Aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:87.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto aññātakaṃ seṭṭhiputtaṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:88.1: Aññātakaṃ gahapatiṃ vā gahapatāniṃ vā tatuttari cīvaraṃ viññāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:88.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahuṃ cīvaraṃ viññāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:89.1: Pubbe appavāritassa aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:89.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakaṃ gahapatikaṃ upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:90.1: Pubbe appavāritassa aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:90.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātake gahapatike upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:91.1: Atirekatikkhattuṃ codanāya atirekachakkhattuṃ ṭhānena cīvaraṃ abhinipphādentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:91.7: “ajjaṇho, bhante, āgamehī”ti vuccamāno nāgamesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:93.1: Kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:93.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kosiyakārake upasaṅkamitvā evamāhaṃsu “bahū, āvuso, kosakārake pacatha.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:93.8: Mayampi icchāma kosiyamissakaṃ santhataṃ kātun”ti, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:94.1: Suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:94.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:95.1: Anādiyitvā tulaṃ odātānaṃ tulaṃ gocariyānaṃ navaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:95.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū thokaññeva odātaṃ ante ādiyitvā tatheva suddhakāḷakānaṃ eḷakalomānaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:96.1: Anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:96.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū anuvassaṃ santhataṃ kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:97.1: Anādiyitvā purāṇasanthatassa sāmantā sugatavidatthiṃ navaṃ nisīdanasanthataṃ kārāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:97.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū santhatāni ujjhitvā āraññikaṅgaṃ piṇḍapātikaṅgaṃ paṃsukūlikaṅgaṃ samādiyiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:98.1: Eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:98.6: Aññataro bhikkhu eḷakalomāni paṭiggahetvā tiyojanaṃ atikkāmesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:98.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:98.10: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:99.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā eḷakalomāni dhovāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:99.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū aññātikāhi bhikkhunīhi eḷakalomāni dhovāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:100.1: Rūpiyaṃ paṭiggaṇhantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:100.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto rūpiyaṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:101.1: Nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:101.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū nānappakārakaṃ rūpiyasaṃvohāraṃ samāpajjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:102.1: Nānappakārakaṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:102.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto paribbājakena saddhiṃ kayavikkayaṃ samāpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.1: Atirekapattaṃ dasāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekapattaṃ dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.9: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:104.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:105.1: Ūnapañcabandhanena pattena aññaṃ navaṃ pattaṃ cetāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:105.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamattakenapi bhinnena appamattakenapi khaṇḍena vilikhitamattenapi bahū patte viññāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:106.1: Bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:106.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū bhesajjāni paṭiggahetvā sattāhaṃ atikkāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:106.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:107.1: Atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:107.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū atirekamāse sese gimhāne vassikasāṭikacīvaraṃ pariyesiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:108.1: Bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupitena anattamanena acchindantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:108.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhikkhussa sāmaṃ cīvaraṃ datvā kupito anattamano acchindi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:109.1: Sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:109.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū sāmaṃ suttaṃ viññāpetvā tantavāyehi cīvaraṃ vāyāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:110.1: Pubbe appavāritassa aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajjantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:110.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto pubbe appavārito aññātakassa gahapatikassa tantavāye upasaṅkamitvā cīvare vikappaṃ āpajji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:111.1: Accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:111.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū accekacīvaraṃ paṭiggahetvā cīvarakālasamayaṃ atikkāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:111.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:112.1: Tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasantassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:112.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū tiṇṇaṃ cīvarānaṃ aññataraṃ cīvaraṃ antaraghare nikkhipitvā atirekachārattaṃ vippavasiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:112.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:113.1: Jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmentassa nissaggiyaṃ pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:113.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ attano pariṇāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena sampajānamusāvāde pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.6: Āyasmā hatthako sakyaputto titthiyehi saddhiṃ sallapanto avajānitvā paṭijāni, paṭijānitvā avajāni, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.9: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:119.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:120.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū pesalehi bhikkhūhi saddhiṃ bhaṇḍantā pesale bhikkhū omasiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:121.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ bhaṇḍanajātānaṃ kalahajātānaṃ vivādāpannānaṃ pesuññaṃ upasaṃhariṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.1: Anupasampannaṃ padaso dhammaṃ vācentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū upāsake padaso dhammaṃ vācesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.9: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:122.10: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.1: Anupasampannena uttaridirattatirattaṃ sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū anupasampannena sahaseyyaṃ kappesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:123.10: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:124.1: Mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:124.6: Āyasmā anuruddho mātugāmena sahaseyyaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:124.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:125.1: Mātugāmassa uttarichappañcavācāhi dhammaṃ desentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:125.6: Āyasmā udāyī mātugāmassa dhammaṃ desesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:125.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti padasodhamme …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.1: Anupasampannassa uttarimanussadhammaṃ bhūtaṃ ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.6: Vaggumudātīriyā bhikkhū gihīnaṃ aññamaññassa uttarimanussadhammassa vaṇṇaṃ bhāsiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.10: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:126.11: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:127.1: Bhikkhussa duṭṭhullaṃ āpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:127.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhussa duṭṭhullāpattiṃ anupasampannassa ārocesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:128.6: Āḷavakā bhikkhū pathaviṃ khaṇiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:130.6: Āḷavakā bhikkhū rukkhaṃ chindiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:131.6: Āyasmā channo saṃghamajjhe āpattiyā anuyuñjiyamāno aññenaññaṃ paṭicari, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:132.6: Mettiyabhūmajakā bhikkhū āyasmantaṃ dabbaṃ mallaputtaṃ bhikkhū ujjhāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:133.1: Saṃghikaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā bhisiṃ vā kocchaṃ vā ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:133.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū saṃghikaṃ senāsanaṃ ajjhokāse santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:133.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:134.1: Saṃghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:134.6: Sattarasavaggiyā bhikkhū saṃghike vihāre seyyaṃ santharitvā anuddharitvā anāpucchā pakkamiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:134.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:135.1: Saṃghike vihāre jānaṃ pubbupagataṃ bhikkhuṃ anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:135.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū there bhikkhū anupakhajja seyyaṃ kappesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:135.9: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:136.1: Bhikkhuṃ kupitena anattamanena saṃghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:136.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū kupitā anattamanā bhikkhū saṃghikā vihārā nikkaḍḍhiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.1: Saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā abhinisīdantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.6: Aññataro bhikkhu saṃghike vihāre uparivehāsakuṭiyā āhaccapādakaṃ mañcaṃ sahasā abhinisīdi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:137.10: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:138.1: Dvattipariyāye adhiṭṭhahitvā tatuttari adhiṭṭhahantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:138.6: Āyasmā channo katapariyositaṃ vihāraṃ punappunaṃ chādāpesi, punappunaṃ limpāpesi, atibhāriko vihāro paripati, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:139.1: Jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇaṃ vā mattikaṃ vā siñcantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:139.6: Āḷavakā bhikkhū jānaṃ sappāṇakaṃ udakaṃ tiṇampi mattikampi siñciṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.1: Asammatena bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū asammatā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.11: siyā vācato samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:141.12: siyā vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na kāyato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:142.1: Atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:142.6: Āyasmā cūḷapanthako atthaṅgate sūriye bhikkhuniyo ovadi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:142.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti padasodhamme …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:143.1: Bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:143.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunupassayaṃ upasaṅkamitvā bhikkhuniyo ovadiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:143.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:144.1: “Āmisahetu bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti bhaṇantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:144.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū “āmisahetu bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo ovadantī”ti bhaṇiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:145.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ dentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:145.6: Aññataro bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ adāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:146.1: Aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:146.6: Āyasmā udāyī aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā cīvaraṃ sibbesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.1: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.10: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.11: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato;
pli-tv-pvr1.1:147.12: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:148.1: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:148.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhunīhi saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaṃ nāvaṃ abhiruhiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:149.1: Jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:149.6: Devadatto jānaṃ bhikkhuniparipācitaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ bhuñji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:149.9: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:150.1: Bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:150.6: Āyasmā udāyī bhikkhuniyā saddhiṃ eko ekāya raho nisajjaṃ kappesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:150.9: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:152.1: Tatuttari āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:152.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū anuvasitvā anuvasitvā āvasathapiṇḍaṃ bhuñjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:152.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:153.6: Devadatto sapariso kulesu viññāpetvā viññāpetvā bhuñji, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:153.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:156.1: Bhuttāvinā pavāritena anatirittaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:156.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:157.1: Bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena khādanīyena vā bhojanīyena vā abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavārentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:157.6: Aññataro bhikkhu bhikkhuṃ bhuttāviṃ pavāritaṃ anatirittena bhojanīyena abhihaṭṭhuṃ pavāresi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:158.1: Vikāle khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:158.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:159.1: Sannidhikārakaṃ khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā bhuñjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:159.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:161.1: Adinnaṃ mukhadvāraṃ āhāraṃ āharantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:161.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:163.1: Acelakassa vā paribbājakassa vā paribbājikāya vā sahatthā khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā dentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:163.6: Āyasmā ānando aññatarissā paribbājikāya ekaṃ maññamāno dve pūve adāsi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:163.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:164.1: Bhikkhuṃ “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti tassa dāpetvā vā adāpetvā vā uyyojentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:164.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto bhikkhuṃ “ehāvuso, gāmaṃ piṇḍāya pavisissāmā”ti, tassa adāpetvā uyyojesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.

pli-tv-pvr1.1:181.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti eḷakalomake …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:182.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:183.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhūnaṃ pattampi cīvarampi apanidhesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.

pli-tv-pvr1.1:188.9: kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:190.1: Jānaṃ theyyasatthena saddhiṃ saṃvidhāya ekaddhānamaggaṃ paṭipajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:192.1: Pāpikāya diṭṭhiyā yāvatatiyaṃ samanubhāsanāya na paṭinissajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:192.9: Kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:194.1: Jānaṃ tathānāsitaṃ samaṇuddesaṃ upalāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?

pli-tv-pvr1.1:200.9: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhāti, na vācato …pe….

pli-tv-pvr1.1:206.1: Samaggena saṃghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:206.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū samaggena saṃghena cīvaraṃ datvā pacchā khīyanadhammaṃ āpajjiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:207.1: Jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:207.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū jānaṃ saṃghikaṃ lābhaṃ pariṇataṃ puggalassa pariṇāmesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:209.1: Pubbe appaṭisaṃviditena rañño antepuraṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:209.6: Āyasmā ānando pubbe appaṭisaṃvidito rañño antepuraṃ pāvisi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:209.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:210.6: Aññataro bhikkhu ratanaṃ uggahesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:211.1: Santaṃ bhikkhuṃ anāpucchā vikāle gāmaṃ pavisantassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:211.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū vikāle gāmaṃ pavisiṃsu, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:211.8: Channaṃ āpattisamuṭṭhānānaṃ dvīhi samuṭṭhānehi samuṭṭhāti kathinake …pe….
pli-tv-pvr1.1:212.1: Aṭṭhimayaṃ vā dantamayaṃ vā visāṇamayaṃ vā sūcigharaṃ kārāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:212.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā bahū sūcighare viññāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:213.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā kārāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:213.6: Āyasmā upanando sakyaputto ucce mañce sayi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:214.1: Mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:214.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū mañcaṃ vā pīṭhaṃ vā tūlonaddhaṃ kārāpesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:215.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ nisīdanaṃ kārāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:215.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamāṇikāni nisīdanāni dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:216.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiṃ kārāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:216.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamāṇikāyo kaṇḍuppaṭicchādiyo dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:217.1: Pamāṇātikkantaṃ vassikasāṭikaṃ kārāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:217.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū appamāṇikāyo vassikasāṭikāyo dhāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:218.1: Sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ kārāpentassa pācittiyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:218.6: Āyasmā nando sugatacīvarappamāṇaṃ cīvaraṃ dhāresi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:232.1: Yaṃ tena bhagavatā jānatā passatā arahatā sammāsambuddhena aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato khādanīyaṃ vā bhojanīyaṃ vā sahatthā paṭiggahetvā bhuñjantassa pāṭidesanīyaṃ kattha paññattanti?
pli-tv-pvr1.1:232.6: Aññataro bhikkhu aññātikāya bhikkhuniyā antaragharaṃ paviṭṭhāya hatthato āmisaṃ paṭiggahesi, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:232.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;

pli-tv-pvr1.1:233.6: Chabbaggiyā bhikkhū bhikkhuniyo vosāsantiyo na nivāresuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:233.9: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhāti, na cittato;

pli-tv-pvr1.1:234.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū na mattaṃ jānitvā paṭiggahesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
pli-tv-pvr1.1:234.9: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhāti, na vācato na cittato;

pli-tv-pvr1.1:235.6: Sambahulā bhikkhū ārāme core paṭivasante nārocesuṃ, tasmiṃ vatthusmiṃ.
